short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a stock price over the extension icon without the need to click on any popup

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows an individual stock price in the extension bar without needing to click on the icon. Great for tracking a single stock price while browsing the web during the day.
